ReportItem.Title: Business And Process Architecture
ReportItem.Description: This is not a report, since the query attribute is not present

ReportItem.Title: Strategic Positioning
ReportItem.Query: SELECT METAView_StrategicStatement_Listing.Name AS [StrategicStatement Name], METAView_StrategicStatement_Listing.UniqueRef AS StrategicStatement, METAView_Implication_Listing.Name AS Implication, METAView_Implication_Listing.ExternalInfluenceIndicator AS [Implication - External Inference Indicator], METAView_Implication_Listing.InternalCapabilityIndicator AS [Implication - Internal Capability Indicator], METAView_Driver_Listing.Name AS [Driver], METAView_EnvironmentCategory_Listing.Name AS [Environment Category], METAView_Environment_Listing.Name AS Environment, METAView_Scenario_Listing.Name AS Scenario, ActiveDiagramObjects.[File Name] FROM ObjectAssociation INNER JOIN METAView_StrategicStatement_Listing ON ObjectAssociation.ObjectID = METAView_StrategicStatement_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ObjectMachine = METAView_StrategicStatement_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN METAView_Implication_Listing ON ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectID = METAView_Implication_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_Implication_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN ObjectAssociation AS ObjectAssociation_1 ON METAView_Implication_Listing.pkid = ObjectAssociation_1.ObjectID AND METAView_Implication_Listing.Machine = ObjectAssociation_1.ObjectMachine INNER JOIN METAView_Driver_Listing ON ObjectAssociation_1.ChildObjectID = METAView_Driver_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation_1.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_Driver_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN ObjectAssociation AS ObjectAssociation_2 ON METAView_Driver_Listing.pkid = ObjectAssociation_2.ObjectID AND METAView_Driver_Listing.Machine = ObjectAssociation_2.ObjectMachine INNER JOIN METAView_EnvironmentCategory_Listing ON ObjectAssociation_2.ChildObjectID = METAView_EnvironmentCategory_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation_2.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_EnvironmentCategory_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN ObjectAssociation AS ObjectAssociation_3 ON METAView_EnvironmentCategory_Listing.pkid = ObjectAssociation_3.ObjectID AND METAView_EnvironmentCategory_Listing.Machine = ObjectAssociation_3.ObjectMachine INNER JOIN METAView_Environment_Listing ON ObjectAssociation_3.ChildObjectID = METAView_Environment_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation_3.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_Environment_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN ObjectAssociation AS ObjectAssociation_4 ON METAView_Environment_Listing.pkid = ObjectAssociation_4.ObjectID AND METAView_Environment_Listing.Machine = ObjectAssociation_4.ObjectMachine INNER JOIN METAView_Scenario_Listing ON ObjectAssociation_4.ChildObjectID = METAView_Scenario_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation_4.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_Scenario_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects ON METAView_StrategicStatement_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects.MetaObjectID AND METAView_StrategicStatement_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_1 ON METAView_Implication_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.MetaObjectID AND METAView_Implication_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_3 ON METAView_EnvironmentCategory_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_3.MetaObjectID AND METAView_EnvironmentCategory_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_3.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_4 ON METAView_Environment_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_4.MetaObjectID AND METAView_Environment_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_4.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_5 ON METAView_Scenario_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_5.MetaObjectID AND METAView_Scenario_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_5.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_2 ON METAView_Driver_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_2.MetaObjectID AND METAView_Driver_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_2.Machine
ReportItem.Description: Strategic Statement --> Implication --> Driver --> Envirnonment Category --> Environment --> Scenario

ReportItem.Title: Strategy
ReportItem.Description: This is not a report, since the query attribute is not present

ReportItem.Title: Organisation Unit Function Strategic Statements Listing
ReportItem.Query: SELECT METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Name AS [Organisational Unit], METAView_Function_Listing.Name AS [Function], METAView_StrategicStatement_Listing.Name AS StrategicStatement, METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.WorkspaceName AS [Workspace Name], AssociationType.Name AS Association, ClassAssociation.Caption, ActiveDiagramObjects_2.[File Name] FROM AssociationType INNER JOIN ClassAssociation INNER JOIN ObjectAssociation ON ClassAssociation.CAid = ObjectAssociation.CAid ON AssociationType.pkid = ClassAssociation.AssociationTypeID INNER JOIN METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing ON ObjectAssociation.ObjectID = METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ObjectMachine = METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN ObjectAssociation AS ObjectAssociation_2 INNER JOIN METAView_Function_Listing ON ObjectAssociation_2.ObjectID = METAView_Function_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation_2.ObjectMachine = METAView_Function_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN METAView_StrategicStatement_Listing ON ObjectAssociation_2.ChildObjectID = METAView_StrategicStatement_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation_2.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_StrategicStatement_Listing.Machine ON ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectID = METAView_Function_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_Function_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects ON METAView_Function_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects.MetaObjectID AND METAView_Function_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_1 ON METAView_StrategicStatement_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.MetaObjectID AND METAView_StrategicStatement_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_2 ON METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_2.MetaObjectID AND METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_2.Machine

ReportItem.Title: Organisation Unit Strategic Statements Listing
ReportItem.Query: SELECT METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Name AS [Organisational Unit], METAView_StrategicStatement_Listing.Name AS StrategicStatement, METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.WorkspaceName AS [Workspace Name], AssociationType.Name AS Association, ClassAssociation.Caption, ActiveDiagramObjects.[File Name] FROM AssociationType INNER JOIN ClassAssociation INNER JOIN ObjectAssociation ON ClassAssociation.CAid = ObjectAssociation.CAid ON AssociationType.pkid = ClassAssociation.AssociationTypeID INNER JOIN METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing ON ObjectAssociation.ObjectID = METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ObjectMachine = METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN METAView_StrategicStatement_Listing ON ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectID = METAView_StrategicStatement_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_StrategicStatement_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects ON METAView_StrategicStatement_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects.MetaObjectID AND METAView_StrategicStatement_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_1 ON METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.MetaObjectID AND METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.Machine

ReportItem.Title: Functions And Processes
ReportItem.Description: This is not a report, since the query attribute is not present

ReportItem.Title: Function Listing
ReportItem.Query: SELECT METAView_Function_Listing.Name AS [Function], METAView_Function_Listing.WorkspaceName AS [Workspace Name], ActiveDiagramObjects.[File Name] FROM METAView_Function_Listing INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects ON METAView_Function_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects.MetaObjectID AND METAView_Function_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects.Machine

ReportItem.Title: Process Listing
ReportItem.Query: SELECT METAView_Process_Listing.Name AS Process, METAView_Process_Listing.WorkspaceName AS [Workspace Name], ActiveDiagramObjects.[File Name] FROM METAView_Process_Listing INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects ON METAView_Process_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects.MetaObjectID AND METAView_Process_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects.Machine

ReportItem.Title: Data
ReportItem.Description: This is not a report, since the query attribute is not present

ReportItem.Title: Data Subject Area Listing
ReportItem.Query: SELECT METAView_DataSubjectArea_Listing.Name AS [Data Subject Area Name], METAView_DataSubjectArea_Listing.WorkspaceName AS [Workspace Name], ActiveDiagramObjects.[File Name] FROM METAView_DataSubjectArea_Listing INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects ON METAView_DataSubjectArea_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects.MetaObjectID AND METAView_DataSubjectArea_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects.Machine
ReportItem.Description: List Of All Data Subject Areas

ReportItem.Title: Entity Dependencies
ReportItem.Query: SELECT ParentEntity.Name AS [Parent Entity], ParentEntity.DataEntityType AS [Parent Entity Type], AssociationType.Name AS [Association Type], ClassAssociation.Caption, ChildEntity.Name AS [Child Entity], ChildEntity.DataEntityType AS [Child Entity Type], ParentEntity.pkid AS [Parent ID], ParentEntity.Machine AS [Parent Machine], ChildEntity.pkid AS [Child ID], ChildEntity.Machine AS [Child Machine], ParentEntity.WorkspaceName AS [Workspace Name], ActiveDiagramObjects.[File Name] FROM ClassAssociation INNER JOIN AssociationType ON ClassAssociation.AssociationTypeID = AssociationType.pkid INNER JOIN ObjectAssociation ON ClassAssociation.CAid = ObjectAssociation.CAid INNER JOIN METAView_DataEntity_Listing AS ParentEntity ON ObjectAssociation.ObjectID = ParentEntity.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ObjectMachine = ParentEntity.Machine INNER JOIN METAView_DataEntity_Listing AS ChildEntity ON ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectID = ChildEntity.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectMachine = ChildEntity.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects ON ParentEntity.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects.MetaObjectID AND ParentEntity.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_1 ON ChildEntity.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.MetaObjectID AND ChildEntity.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.Machine
ReportItem.Description: List of dependencies between data entities

ReportItem.Title: Attribute Listing
ReportItem.Query: SELECT DISTINCT METAView_DataEntity_Listing.Name AS [Entity Name], METAView_DataEntity_Listing.DataEntityType AS [Entity Type], METAView_DataAttribute_Listing.Name AS Attibute, ClassAssociation.Caption AS [DataAttribute Type], METAView_DataEntity_Listing.WorkspaceName AS [Workspace Name], ActiveDiagramObjects.[File Name] FROM ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_1 INNER JOIN AssociationType INNER JOIN ClassAssociation ON AssociationType.pkid = ClassAssociation.AssociationTypeID INNER JOIN ObjectAssociation ON ClassAssociation.CAid = ObjectAssociation.CAid INNER JOIN METAView_DataAttribute_Listing ON ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectID = METAView_DataAttribute_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_DataAttribute_Listing.Machine ON ActiveDiagramObjects_1.MetaObjectID = METAView_DataAttribute_Listing.pkid AND ActiveDiagramObjects_1.Machine = METAView_DataAttribute_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN METAView_DataEntity_Listing INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects ON METAView_DataEntity_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects.MetaObjectID AND METAView_DataEntity_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects.Machine ON ObjectAssociation.ObjectID = METAView_DataEntity_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ObjectMachine = METAView_DataEntity_Listing.Machine
ReportItem.Description: List Of All Attributes On Entities

ReportItem.Title: Selector Attributes For Subset Dependencies
ReportItem.Query: SELECT K.Name AS SelectorAttribute, YZ.Name AS Superset, X.Name AS Subset, 'SubsetOf' AS ConnectionType FROM ClassAssociation INNER JOIN ObjectAssociation ON ClassAssociation.CAid = ObjectAssociation.CAid INNER JOIN AssociationType ON ClassAssociation.AssociationTypeID = AssociationType.pkid INNER JOIN METAView_DataEntity_Listing AS YZ ON ObjectAssociation.ObjectID = YZ.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ObjectMachine = YZ.Machine INNER JOIN METAView_DataEntity_Listing AS X ON ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectID = X.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectMachine = X.Machine LEFT OUTER JOIN Artifact AS ART INNER JOIN METAView_SelectorAttribute_Listing AS K ON ART.ArtifactObjectID = K.pkid AND ART.ArtefactMachine = K.Machine ON ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectMachine = ART.ChildObjectMachine AND ObjectAssociation.ObjectMachine = ART.ObjectMachine AND ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectID = ART.ChildObjectID AND ObjectAssociation.ObjectID = ART.ObjectID AND ObjectAssociation.CAid = ART.CAid WHERE (AssociationType.Name = 'SubsetOf') UNION SELECT K.Name AS SelectorAttribute, X.Name AS Superset, YZ.Name AS Subset, 'MutuallyExlusive' AS ConnectionType FROM METAView_DataEntity_Listing AS X INNER JOIN METAView_DataEntity_Listing AS YZ INNER JOIN METAView_SubSetIndicator_Listing INNER JOIN ObjectAssociation AS ObjectAssociation_1 ON METAView_SubSetIndicator_Listing.Machine = ObjectAssociation_1.ObjectMachine AND METAView_SubSetIndicator_Listing.pkid = ObjectAssociation_1.ObjectID INNER JOIN ObjectAssociation ON METAView_SubSetIndicator_Listing.pkid = ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectID AND METAView_SubSetIndicator_Listing.Machine = ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectMachine ON YZ.pkid = ObjectAssociation.ObjectID AND YZ.Machine = ObjectAssociation.ObjectMachine ON X.pkid = ObjectAssociation_1.ChildObjectID AND X.Machine = ObjectAssociation_1.ChildObjectMachine INNER JOIN ClassAssociation ON ObjectAssociation_1.CAid = ClassAssociation.CAid INNER JOIN AssociationType ON ClassAssociation.AssociationTypeID = AssociationType.pkid LEFT OUTER JOIN Artifact AS ART INNER JOIN METAView_SelectorAttribute_Listing AS K ON ART.ArtifactObjectID = K.pkid AND ART.ArtefactMachine = K.Machine ON ObjectAssociation_1.ObjectID = ART.ObjectID AND ObjectAssociation_1.ChildObjectID = ART.ChildObjectID AND ObjectAssociation_1.ObjectMachine = ART.ObjectMachine AND ObjectAssociation_1.ChildObjectMachine = ART.ChildObjectMachine WHERE (AssociationType.Name = 'SubsetOf')

ReportItem.Title: Organisation Reports
ReportItem.Description: This is not a report, since the query attribute is not present

ReportItem.Title: Organisational Unit Listing
ReportItem.Query: SELECT METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Name AS [Organisation Unit Name], METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.WorkspaceName AS [Workspace Name], ActiveDiagramObjects.[File Name] FROM METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects ON METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects.MetaObjectID AND METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects.Machine

ReportItem.Title: Organisational Unit Responsibility
ReportItem.Query: SELECT METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Name AS [Organisation Unit Name], METAView_Function_Listing.Name AS Responsibility, METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.WorkspaceName AS [Workspace Name], ActiveDiagramObjects.[File Name] FROM METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing INNER JOIN ObjectAssociation ON METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.pkid = ObjectAssociation.ObjectID AND METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Machine = ObjectAssociation.ObjectMachine INNER JOIN METAView_Function_Listing ON ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectID = METAView_Function_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_Function_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects ON METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects.MetaObjectID AND METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_1 ON METAView_Function_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.MetaObjectID AND METAView_Function_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.Machine UNION SELECT METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Name AS [Organisation Unit Name], METAView_Process_Listing.Name AS Responsibility, METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.WorkspaceName AS [Workspace Name], ActiveDiagramObjects.[File Name] FROM METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing INNER JOIN ObjectAssociation ON METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.pkid = ObjectAssociation.ObjectID AND METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Machine = ObjectAssociation.ObjectMachine INNER JOIN METAView_Process_Listing ON ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectID = METAView_Process_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_Process_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects ON METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects.MetaObjectID AND METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_1 ON METAView_Process_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.MetaObjectID AND METAView_Process_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.Machine

ReportItem.Title: Organisational Unit To Governance Mechanism
ReportItem.Query: SELECT METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Name AS [Organisation Unit Name], METAView_GovernanceMechanism_Listing.Name AS [Governance Mechanism], METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.WorkspaceName AS [Workspace Name], ActiveDiagramObjects.[File Name] FROM ObjectAssociation INNER JOIN METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing ON ObjectAssociation.ObjectID = METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ObjectMachine = METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN METAView_GovernanceMechanism_Listing ON ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectID = METAView_GovernanceMechanism_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_GovernanceMechanism_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects ON METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects.MetaObjectID AND METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_1 ON METAView_GovernanceMechanism_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.MetaObjectID AND METAView_GovernanceMechanism_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.Machine

ReportItem.Title: Location Reports
ReportItem.Description: This is not a report, since the query attribute is not present

ReportItem.Title: Locations
ReportItem.Query: SELECT METAView_Location_Listing.Name AS Location, METAView_Location_Listing.WorkspaceName AS [Workspace Name], ActiveDiagramObjects.[File Name] FROM METAView_Location_Listing INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects ON METAView_Location_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects.MetaObjectID AND METAView_Location_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects.Machine

ReportItem.Title: Business Process Operation
ReportItem.Description: This is not a report, since the query attribute is not present

ReportItem.Title: Organisation Unit Responsibility And Data Artefact Inputs
ReportItem.Query: SELECT METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Name AS [Organisation Unit], METAView_Function_Listing.Name AS Responsibility, AssociationType.Name AS [Association Type], METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing.Name AS [Physical Information Artefact], METAView_Function_Listing.WorkspaceName AS [Workspace Name], ActiveDiagramObjects_1.[File Name] FROM ObjectAssociation AS ObjectAssociation_1 INNER JOIN ClassAssociation INNER JOIN ObjectAssociation ON ClassAssociation.CAid = ObjectAssociation.CAid INNER JOIN AssociationType ON ClassAssociation.AssociationTypeID = AssociationType.pkid INNER JOIN METAView_Function_Listing ON ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectID = METAView_Function_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_Function_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing ON ObjectAssociation.ObjectID = METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ObjectMachine = METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing.Machine ON ObjectAssociation_1.ObjectID = METAView_Function_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation_1.ObjectMachine = METAView_Function_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing ON ObjectAssociation_1.ChildObjectID = METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation_1.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects ON METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects.MetaObjectID AND METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_1 ON METAView_Function_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.MetaObjectID AND METAView_Function_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_2 ON METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_2.MetaObjectID AND METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_2.Machine WHERE (AssociationType.Name = 'Read') UNION SELECT METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Name AS [Organisation Unit], METAView_Process_Listing.Name AS Responsibility, AssociationType.Name AS [Association Type], METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing.Name AS [Physical Information Artefact], METAView_Process_Listing.WorkspaceName AS [Workspace Name], ActiveDiagramObjects.[File Name] FROM METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing INNER JOIN ObjectAssociation INNER JOIN ClassAssociation ON ObjectAssociation.CAid = ClassAssociation.CAid INNER JOIN AssociationType ON ClassAssociation.AssociationTypeID = AssociationType.pkid INNER JOIN METAView_Process_Listing ON ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectID = METAView_Process_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_Process_Listing.Machine ON METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing.pkid = ObjectAssociation.ObjectID AND METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing.Machine = ObjectAssociation.ObjectMachine INNER JOIN ObjectAssociation AS ObjectAssociation_1 ON METAView_Process_Listing.pkid = ObjectAssociation_1.ObjectID AND METAView_Process_Listing.Machine = ObjectAssociation_1.ObjectMachine INNER JOIN METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing ON ObjectAssociation_1.ChildObjectID = METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation_1.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_1 ON METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.MetaObjectID AND METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects ON METAView_Process_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects.MetaObjectID AND METAView_Process_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_2 ON METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_2.MetaObjectID AND METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_2.Machine WHERE (AssociationType.Name = 'Read')

ReportItem.Title: Organisation Unit Responsibility And Data Artefact Outputs
ReportItem.Query: SELECT METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Name AS [Organisation Unit], METAView_Function_Listing.Name AS Responsibility, AssociationType.Name AS [Association Type], METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing.Name AS [Physical Information Artefact], METAView_Function_Listing.WorkspaceName AS [Workspace Name], ActiveDiagramObjects.[File Name] FROM ObjectAssociation AS ObjectAssociation_1 INNER JOIN ClassAssociation INNER JOIN ObjectAssociation ON ClassAssociation.CAid = ObjectAssociation.CAid INNER JOIN AssociationType ON ClassAssociation.AssociationTypeID = AssociationType.pkid INNER JOIN METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing ON ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectID = METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN METAView_Function_Listing ON ObjectAssociation.ObjectID = METAView_Function_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ObjectMachine = METAView_Function_Listing.Machine ON ObjectAssociation_1.ObjectID = METAView_Function_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation_1.ObjectMachine = METAView_Function_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing ON ObjectAssociation_1.ChildObjectID = METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation_1.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_1 ON METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.MetaObjectID AND METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects ON METAView_Function_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects.MetaObjectID AND METAView_Function_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_2 ON METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_2.MetaObjectID AND METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_2.Machine WHERE (AssociationType.Name = 'Maintain') OR (AssociationType.Name = 'Update') OR (AssociationType.Name = 'Insert') OR (AssociationType.Name = 'Delete') OR (AssociationType.Name = 'Create') UNION SELECT METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Name AS [Organisation Unit], METAView_Process_Listing.Name AS Responsibility, AssociationType.Name AS [Association Type], METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing.Name AS [Physical Information Artefact], METAView_Process_Listing.WorkspaceName AS [Workspace Name], ActiveDiagramObjects.[File Name] FROM ObjectAssociation AS ObjectAssociation_1 INNER JOIN ClassAssociation INNER JOIN ObjectAssociation ON ClassAssociation.CAid = ObjectAssociation.CAid INNER JOIN AssociationType ON ClassAssociation.AssociationTypeID = AssociationType.pkid INNER JOIN METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing ON ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectID = METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN METAView_Process_Listing ON ObjectAssociation.ObjectID = METAView_Process_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ObjectMachine = METAView_Process_Listing.Machine ON ObjectAssociation_1.ObjectID = METAView_Process_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation_1.ObjectMachine = METAView_Process_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing ON ObjectAssociation_1.ChildObjectID = METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation_1.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_1 ON METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.MetaObjectID AND METAView_OrganizationalUnit_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects ON METAView_Process_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects.MetaObjectID AND METAView_Process_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_2 ON METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_2.MetaObjectID AND METAView_PhysicalInformationArtefact_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_2.Machine WHERE (AssociationType.Name = 'Maintain') OR (AssociationType.Name = 'Update') OR (AssociationType.Name = 'Insert') OR (AssociationType.Name = 'Delete') OR (AssociationType.Name = 'Create')

ReportItem.Title: Application Architecture
ReportItem.Description: This is not a report, since the query attribute is not present

ReportItem.Title: Physical Software Component List
ReportItem.Query: SELECT METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing.Name AS [Physical Software Component Name], METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing.VersionNumber, METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing.SoftwareType, METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing.Description, METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing.WorkspaceName AS [Workspace Name] FROM METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects ON METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects.MetaObjectID AND METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects.Machine

ReportItem.Title: Physical Software Component Interfaces
ReportItem.Query: SELECT Originator.Name AS [Originator Name], Originator.SoftwareType AS [Originator Type], AssociationType.Name AS [Association Type], Respondent.Name AS [Respondent Name], Respondent.SoftwareType AS [Respondent Type], Originator.WorkspaceName AS [Workspace Name], ActiveDiagramObjects.[File Name] FROM ObjectAssociation INNER JOIN METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing AS Originator ON ObjectAssociation.ObjectID = Originator.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ObjectMachine = Originator.Machine INNER JOIN METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing AS Respondent ON ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectID = Respondent.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectMachine = Respondent.Machine INNER JOIN ClassAssociation ON ObjectAssociation.CAid = ClassAssociation.CAid INNER JOIN AssociationType ON ClassAssociation.AssociationTypeID = AssociationType.pkid INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects ON Originator.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects.MetaObjectID AND Originator.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_1 ON Respondent.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.MetaObjectID AND Respondent.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.Machine WHERE (AssociationType.Name = 'DynamicFlow')

ReportItem.Title: Application Databases
ReportItem.Query: SELECT METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing.Name AS [Physical Software Component Name], METAView_DataSubjectArea_Listing.Name AS [Data Subject Area], METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing.WorkspaceName AS [Workspace Name], ActiveDiagramObjects.[File Name] FROM ObjectAssociation INNER JOIN METAView_DataSubjectArea_Listing ON ObjectAssociation.ObjectID = METAView_DataSubjectArea_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ObjectMachine = METAView_DataSubjectArea_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing ON ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectID = METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing.pkid AND ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects ON METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects.MetaObjectID AND METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_1 ON METAView_DataSubjectArea_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.MetaObjectID AND METAView_DataSubjectArea_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.Machine

ReportItem.Title: IT And Infrastructure
ReportItem.Description: This is not a report, since the query attribute is not present

ReportItem.Title: Physical Software Component On Hardware
ReportItem.Query: SELECT METAView_ComputingComponent_Listing.Name AS [Hardware Name], METAView_ComputingComponent_Listing.ComputingComponentType AS [Hardware Type], METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing.Name AS [Physical Software Component Name], METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing.VersionNumber AS [Physical Software Component Version], METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing.SoftwareType AS [Sofware Type], METAView_ComputingComponent_Listing.WorkspaceName AS [Workspace Name], ActiveDiagramObjects.[File Name] FROM ObjectAssociation INNER JOIN METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing ON ObjectAssociation.ObjectMachine = METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing.Machine AND ObjectAssociation.ObjectID = METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing.pkid INNER JOIN METAView_ComputingComponent_Listing ON ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectMachine = METAView_ComputingComponent_Listing.Machine AND ObjectAssociation.ChildObjectID = METAView_ComputingComponent_Listing.pkid INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects AS ActiveDiagramObjects_1 ON METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.MetaObjectID AND METAView_PhysicalSoftwareComponent_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects_1.Machine INNER JOIN ActiveDiagramObjects ON METAView_ComputingComponent_Listing.pkid = ActiveDiagramObjects.MetaObjectID AND METAView_ComputingComponent_Listing.Machine = ActiveDiagramObjects.Machine ORDER BY [Hardware Name]

ReportItem.Title: Meta Model
ReportItem.Description: This is not a report, since the query attribute is not present

ReportItem.Title: Object Classes
ReportItem.Query: SELECT dbo.Class.Name AS Class, dbo.Class.Category, dbo.Field.Name AS Field, dbo.Field.DataType AS [Data Type], dbo.Field.Description, dbo.Field.SortOrder FROM dbo.Class INNER JOIN dbo.Field ON dbo.Class.Name = dbo.Field.Class WHERE dbo.Class.IsActive = 1 AND dbo.Field.IsActive = 1

ReportItem.Title: Object Class Associations
ReportItem.Query: SELECT dbo.Class.Name AS [From Class], dbo.AssociationType.Name AS [Association Type], Class_1.Name AS [To Class], dbo.ClassAssociation.CAid FROM dbo.Class INNER JOIN dbo.ClassAssociation ON dbo.Class.Name = dbo.ClassAssociation.ParentClass INNER JOIN dbo.Class AS Class_1 ON dbo.ClassAssociation.ChildClass = Class_1.Name INNER JOIN dbo.AssociationType ON dbo.ClassAssociation.AssociationTypeID = dbo.AssociationType.pkid WHERE dbo.ClassAssociation.IsActive = 1

ReportItem.Title: Artefacts On Object Class Associations
ReportItem.Query: SELECT dbo.Class.Name AS [From Class], dbo.AssociationType.Name AS [Association Type], Class_1.Name AS [To Class], dbo.ClassAssociation.CAid, dbo.AllowedArtifact.Class AS [Artefact Class] FROM dbo.Class INNER JOIN dbo.ClassAssociation ON dbo.Class.Name = dbo.ClassAssociation.ParentClass INNER JOIN dbo.Class AS Class_1 ON dbo.ClassAssociation.ChildClass = Class_1.Name INNER JOIN dbo.AssociationType ON dbo.ClassAssociation.AssociationTypeID = dbo.AssociationType.pkid INNER JOIN dbo.AllowedArtifact ON dbo.ClassAssociation.CAid = dbo.AllowedArtifact.CAid WHERE dbo.AllowedArtifact.IsActive = 1
ReportItem.Description: All Artifacts Allowed On Specified Associations

ReportItem.Title: Domain Values For Object Properties
ReportItem.Query: SELECT dbo.DomainDefinition.Name AS [Domain Definition], dbo.DomainDefinitionPossibleValue.PossibleValue AS [Possible Value], dbo.DomainDefinitionPossibleValue.Series, dbo.DomainDefinitionPossibleValue.Description FROM dbo.DomainDefinition INNER JOIN dbo.DomainDefinitionPossibleValue ON dbo.DomainDefinition.pkid = dbo.DomainDefinitionPossibleValue.DomainDefinitionID WHERE dbo.DomainDefinition.IsActive = 1 AND DomainDefinitionPossibleValue.IsActive = 1
